Package field

Class PublicService

  • java.lang.Object
    • field.FieldElement
      • field.Property
        • field.PublicService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElectricityProvider, WaterProvider
    public abstract class PublicService
extends Property
implements ServiceProvider
    This class represents the public services such as electricity and water that a player can own in order to make other players pay for their "use"

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Dice dice
      The dice of the game (needed for the rent)
      protected double equipedRentBonus
      This attribute will be used by @see WaterProvider and @see ElectricityProvider.

    • Field Detail

      • dice

        private Dice dice
        The dice of the game (needed for the rent)

      • equipedRentBonus

        protected double equipedRentBonus
        This attribute will be used by @see WaterProvider and @see ElectricityProvider. It will be used to fix the rising rent multiplier

      • getRent

        public int getRent()

        Gets the rent of this property This method must be overriden by all subclasses
        Specified by:
        getRent in class Property
        Returns:
        the rent of this property

      • toPay

        private int toPay()
        Computes the rent. The rent is computed like so: - if the owner owns 1 public service, the rent is equal to 4 * the result of the dices - if the owner owns 2 public services, the rent is equal to 10 * the result of the dices
        Parameters:
        result - The result of the dices roll.
        Returns:
        The price of the rent.

      • allowsContract

        public boolean allowsContract()
        Description copied from interface: ServiceProvider

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if it's possible
